metadata.name: Jon Walking, Très Mall
metadata.description:
Très ☹ Mall is a political cartoon following four friends living in an abandoned mall and featuring writers discussing topics in philosophy, violence and capitalism in the Anthropocene. 

Stream episodes 1-5 at https://dis.art/series/tres-mall/

EP.5 VIOLENCE ENTREPRENEURS [31min 17sec] Featuring: Emily Apter [NYU], Nicole Sunday Grove [U Hawaii], Priyamvada Gopal [Cambridge], Steven Osuna [CSULB], McKenzie Wark [New School]. With music by: Aki Onda, Bless, Castlebeat, Cup, DVS1, Fake Fruit, Gladys Lazer, Gorgeous Dykes, Henri O. R. Asar, Headroom, Honey Cutt, Little Star, Luna, Neutrals, Pure Bathing Culture, Romantic States, Remy Bluebells, Sort of Damocles, The Sea and Cake, Sunburned Hand of the Man, You Said Strange.
